parameters.$apply: filter(SITE eq '@{triggerBody()?['text']}' and year(DATE) eq @{formatDateTime(triggerBody()?['date'],'yyyy')} and month(DATE) eq @{formatDateTime(triggerBody()?['date'],'MM')}and DEPOSIT_FLAG ne 'V' and REVENUE_CATEGORY ne 'Per Man Hour')/aggregate(NETEXTERNALREVENUE with sum as TotalNetExternalRevenue)

filter(SITE eq '@{triggerBody()?['text']}' and year(DATE) eq @{formatDateTime(triggerBody()?['date'],'yyyy')} and month(DATE) eq @{formatDateTime(triggerBody()?['date'],'MM')} and DEPOSIT_FLAG eq 'V' and REVENUE_CATEGORY ne 'Per Man Hour')/aggregate(BILLABLE_NET_VALIDATION with sum as ValidationRevenue)

parameters.$filter: bs_site eq '@{triggerBody()?['text']}' and bs_month eq '@{formatDateTime(triggerBody()?['date'],'MM')}' and bs_year eq '@{formatDateTime(triggerBody()?['date'],'yyyy')}'
bs_site eq '@{triggerBody()?['text']}' and bs_month eq '@{formatDateTime(triggerBody()?['date'],'MM')}' and bs_year eq '@{formatDateTime(triggerBody()?['date'],'yyyy')}'
bs_site eq '@{triggerBody()?['text']}' and bs_month eq '@{formatDateTime(triggerBody()?['date'],'MM')}' and bs_year eq '@{formatDateTime(triggerBody()?['date'],'yyyy')}'
